amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to regulate activites or to limit exemptions contained in the Water Pollution Control Act with respect to established or ongoing operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to regulate activites identified in subparagraphs (A) and (C) of section 404(f)(1) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act or to limit the exemption in section 404(f)(1)(A) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to established or ongoing operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 182 (Roll no. 394).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 182 (Roll no. 394).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
